features: Tackle dirty dishes like an expert with this classic dish mop design
This small mop design is ideal for cleaning your dishes. Use this mop across your plates to get them sparkling clean
The Elliott Dish Mop is useful for other cleaning tasks like wiping dust from skirting boards or mopping up mess from worktops
Our mop is perfect for cleaning all types of crockery and glassware simply use the mop inside the items with warm soapy water before removing and rinsing
This mop has a cotton head and sturdy wooden handle for strength and durability
body.description: Product Description Try the Elliott Dish Mop for cleaning around your home and kitchen. This small mop design is ideal for cleaning your dishes. Use our mop across your plates to get them sparkling clean. The Elliott Dish Mop is useful for other cleaning tasks around the home like wiping dust from skirting boards or mopping up mess from worktops. Our mop is perfect for cups, jugs, vases and glassware. Simply use the mop inside the glassware with warm soapy water before removing and rinsing. This mop has a cotton head and sturdy wooden handle for strength and durability. Elliott covers essential cleaning products; with a wide selection in laundry, dish brushes, rubber gloves, nail brushes, indoor and outdoor brushware and other essential cleaning items. Our range is practical and functional for your everyday cleaning needs Set Contains: 1x Dish Mop

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Since it is very sturdy, itshouldn't ever break!!
reviews.reviewText: This will last for a very long time so it is well worth the money!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Holds up very well
reviews.reviewText: Love this dish mop, I have been looking for one with a sturdier wooden handle and this is it, very pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A bit skimpier than the one I had before.
reviews.reviewText: I like the wood handle. It seems as if there is not as much to it as the previous ones I've had.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars this is how you wash delicate glassware
reviews.reviewText: I worked at an A&W Rootbeer stand as a teenager. I think that is where I first saw these. They are perfect for washing delicate glassware or glasses that your hand will not fit into. I can't understand why these are not more available in the US. They would be perfect for bartenders or anyone needing to wash a lot of glassware fast, when they can't be put into a dishwasher. Maybe because of sanitary issues? Just put it in a small glass of vodka when not in use. Very happy to have found these here. Thank you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not What I Expected
reviews.reviewText: The mop, I feel, is overpriced. The mop head has sparse strings around a rather large wooden handle, making it ineffective at cleaning. I expected the mop head to be much thicker. If it were, the wooden handle extending through the mop head would not make one feel as if you were using a stick to clean with!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for cleaning my coffee pot
reviews.reviewText: Very sturdy, well made, looks like a miniature string mop. Great for cleaning out tea/coffee pot, blenders, tall glasses etc

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2019
reviews.reviewText: I got to assist with washing dishes. It just doesn't work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for jars, thermos bottles and I have used it to wash dishes.
